Header.title: Welcome to GPT News
Header.paragraph: Welcome to GPT News, a weekly newsletter fashioned out of nothing by a ChatGPT model. Fill up the form below to subscribe to the newsletter.

About.paragraph: Hello guys, I'm SBK and I enjoy creating, whatever it may be. I started my Dev journey in late 2020 and early 2021 and have been absolutely stoked with it at the time. I freelance for Web Development and am looking for opportunities in Machine Learning and Data Science. I have a passion for learning whatever new technology I lay my eyes on.

Features.title: Custom Notifications
Features.text: Set a custom message for each notification.

Features.title: Timely Notifications
Features.text: Timely Notifications on Desktop to grab your attention.

Features.title: Mnemos all around.
Features.text: Notifications are lightweight and easy to use. Entrust it all to us.

Features.title: Zero Distraction
Features.text: Mnemosyne jumps to System Tray. So forget about it and put all your focus on other stuff.
